name.ja: <ruby>妖精伝姫<rt>フェアリーテイル</rt></ruby>の<ruby>舞<rt>ぶ</rt></ruby><ruby>踏<rt>とう</rt></ruby><ruby>会<rt>かい</rt></ruby>

text.en: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Fairy Tail" monster or "Fairy Tail Tales" from your Deck or banishment to your hand. Your "Fairy Tail" monsters can attack directly. Once per turn, if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) and you control a "Fairy Tail" monster (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects, also its name becomes "Fairy Prince". You can only activate 1 "Fairy Tail Ball" per turn.
